items.text: Since you want to offset the icon to the top right, you will need to offset the (x, y) position slightly, but make sure you use dp because if you simply offset the (x,y) by some amount it willnot translate to different devices.
items.href: custom event icon/add small icon to event · Issue #181 · SundeepK/CompactCalendarView · GitHub

items.text: There is a simple method call in android to go from pixels to dp.
